aguamenti.description: creates a gush of water from the tip of the spell caster’s wand

avis.description: makes birds fly out of the end of your wand

bombarda.description: causes a small, locally contained explosion

colloportus.description: closes a door and binds it so that it can’t be opened

confringo.description: causes the item targeted to explode

confundus.description: confounds your target, or makes them temporarily confused

conjunctivitis.description: damages the eyesight of your opponent, making them seem to have pink eye

deletrius.description: erases the last spell cast by a wand so that it can’t be discovered

densaugeo.description: makes teeth grow out of control

diffindo.description: makes seams split open, severs an object into two pieces

dissendium.description: opens a specific passageway into a cellar

engorgio.description: makes an item larger, as in swollen

evanesco.description: causes an item to immediately dissolve away, as if it had never existed

expelliarmus.description: disarms the target of the spell

ferula.description: binds a broken limb with a splint and bandages

fidelius.description: allows a secret to be hidden within the secret keeper’s soul

flagrate.description: allows the user to write or draw in the air with fire

furnunculus.description: causes a person to break out in boils

geminio.description: creates a duplicate of an item

homenum revelio.description: reveals the presence of other humans

homorphus.description: makes a werewolf or person disguised as an animal resume their human shape

impedimenta.description: puts up an impediment that slows down something or someone that is coming toward you

imperio.description: allows the user to assume complete control of another person

legilimens.description: allows the user to gain access to another’s mind and memories

levicorpus.description: turns your opponent upside down and dangles them in thin air

liberacorpus.description: frees a body that has been caught up by the levicorpus spell

locomotor.description: levitates a target off the ground

mobiliarbus.description: used to move a tree from one place to another

mobilicorpus.description: used to move a body from one place to another

morsmordre.description: used to summon the Dark Mark

muffliato.description: causes a buzzing noise to surround a limited area

obliviate.description: erases a person's memories of an event

orchideous.description: conjures a bunch of flowers from the user’s wand

point me.description: makes the user’s wand act like a compass

portus.description: turns any item into a portkey

prior incantato.description: reveals to you the last spell that a wand was used to cast

protego.description: protects the user, and sends a spell back on an opponent

relashio.description: releases something from being constrained or held

rennervate.description: used to wake up a stunned person

repello inimicum.description: conjures a barrier of magical protection

repello muggletum.description: makes an area invisible to muggles

revelio.description: causes something that is hidden to be revealed

rictusempra.description: causes a person to curl up in laughter, as if being tickled

riddikulus.description: makes a boggart assume a “ridiculous” form

salvio hexia.description: deflects any hexes cast toward a specific location

scourgify.description: used to clean dirt or other material off of a surface

sectumsempra.description: causes lacerations to appear all over an opponent’s body

silencio.description: makes the target of the spell unable to make any sound

tarantallegra.description: forces an opponent’s legs to dance uncontrollably

wingardium leviosa.description: allows the user to make an object levitate
